GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: Fix UAF in ieee80211_scan_rx()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.142 by commit 4abc8c07a065ecf771827bde3c63fbbe4aa0c08b. For more details please see the references link.
